description.ruby-sapphire:
Spins the body at high
speed to strike the foe.
description.emerald:
Spins the body at high
speed to strike the foe.
description.firered-leafgreen:
An attack that
frees the user from
BIND, WRAP, LEECH
SEED, and SPIKES.
description.diamond-pearl:
A spin attack that
can also eliminate
such moves as Bind,
Wrap, Leech Seed,
and Spikes.

description.sword-shield:
A spin attack that can also eliminate such moves as
Bind, Wrap, and Leech Seed. This also raises the user’s
Speed stat.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Removes leech seed from the user, frees the user from bind, clamp, fire spin, magma storm, sand tomb, whirlpool, and wrap, and clears spikes, stealth rock, and toxic spikes from the user's side of the field.  If this move misses or has no effect, its effect doesn't activate.
effect.shortEffect: Frees the user from binding moves, removes Leech Seed, and blows away Spikes.
